def counter_effect(hit_count):
    return [[i for i in range(int(hit_count[x]) + 1)] for x in range(4)]

def counter_effect(n):
    return [list(range(int(x)+1)) for x in n]

def counter_effect(hit_count):
    return [list(range(int(s) + 1)) for s in hit_count]

def counter_effect(hit_count):
    return [[i for i in range(int(x)+1)] for x in hit_count]
